product_name: Fischer BCX Variolight Adjustable Ski Poles - Pair
long_description: The lightweight BCX Variolight Ski Poles feature a secure adjustable system so you can quickly fine-tune the length to your needs while you're getting off the groomed tracks into fresh snow.
short_description: The lightweight BCX Variolight Ski Poles feature a secure adjustable system so you can quickly fine-tune the length to your needs while you're getting off the groomed tracks into fresh snow.
